newCriteria

public ContentCriteria newCriteria()
Description copied from interface: ContentLoader
Creates a new content criteria. The criteria is created with the following flags:
  • Uncategorized contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Due contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Fetch bytes: no.
  • Use request locale: yes.

Specified by:
newCriteria in interface ContentLoader
Overrides:
newCriteria in class ForwardingContentLoader
Returns:
A newly created content criteria.
See Also:
ContentLoader.newCriteria()

newCriteria

public ContentCriteria newCriteria(ContentType contentType)
Description copied from interface: ContentLoader
Creates a new content type-specific criteria. The criteria is created with the following flags:
  • Uncategorized contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Due contents: as specified by the portal.
  • Fetch bytes: no.
  • Use request locale: yes.

Specified by:
newCriteria in interface ContentLoader
Overrides:
newCriteria in class ForwardingContentLoader
Parameters:
contentType - Content type to filter.
Returns:
A newly created content query.
See Also:
ContentLoader.newCriteria(com.isotrol.impe3.api.ContentType)
